body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom, H13 True HEPA Filter for A11ergies, Pollen, Dusts, Pets Dander, Odor, Hair, Ozone Free, 20db Quiet for Home, Room, Kitchen, SGS Certificaion - AC400 Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: Highly Efficient Purification: Absorb 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns in size, such as pollen, dusts, pet dander and more. It provides coverage for areas up to 880 ft² (CADR 110 m³/h).
50% More Filter Area: Unlike other products of similar size with a CADR of 110 m³/h, we have incorporated a larger filter and a more robust motor to boost purification efficiency by 50%.

Finding our replacement filters is easy! Our filters are available for purchase on Amazon. Simply search for B0B87PGZ17 using the search bar on Amazon, and you will be able to find our compatible filters. Enjoy the convenience of accessing high-quality replacement filters for your Purivortex AC400 air purifier directly on Amazon.

20dB Silent Operation & Night Lights: Our product features a variety of lighting options to match different scenarios. Activate the sleep mode, and all lights will be turned off while maintaining an ultra-quiet operation at just 20dB.

SGS Certified: Our product proudly bears the SGS certification, demonstrating its outstanding ability to effectively purify various pollutants. It's worth noting that our product is completely ozone-free and environmentally friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High functioning for fairly large rooms
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for our classroom since my oil diffuser didn't have the qualities I was hoping to bring. Our classroom celebrated 100 years last spring and has an older musty smell, especially after a rain. With my purifier I do not smell any lingering mustiness or meals after we've cleaned up. Many other teachers have complimented how nice and fresh our room smells, and they have purchased these as well.Pros: ease of use (continously or timer work well), easy filter change, maximum quality air for our fairly large classroom, excellent coverage, I like the color display for fun ambienceCons: none to report. (Though I do wish the cord was somewhat thicker so it did not catch as easily.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: We have zero air circulation in the basement and it can get quite stuffy down there for the kids when they play. Got this tiny purifier and within a few hours, you can tell the difference in the air quality. It's quite, great size and quality is amazing. For the price we paid for, definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, not sure it helps
reviews.reviewText: I like the way the purifier looks. It blends in well and isn’t an eyesore but I purchased it for its purification abilities.I got it at a great price. CADR 110 so not bad for a small room.I have it in the family room adjacent and open to the kitchen and I cooked fish a day ago and can still smell it with the purifier running 24 hours daily. It’s not too loud on medium but on high it’s pretty noisy. The filter is larger than most which is a good thing. Seems like it’s built well. I haven’t noticed an appreciable difference in air quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little air purifier
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to use, does the job, and the night light that changes colors is gorgeous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice… Very Nice! Excellent Buy.
reviews.reviewText: When I was unpacking this Air Purifier, I had a feeling I was in for a good surprise!The packaging was excellent, this company wants it well protected in route to the customer. Nothing cheap here.The Air Purifier is a great size, great instructions. I received this one less than hour ago, it was that easy & quick to locate the filter & adapter, put it together and start it up. The operating panel is easy to use, it is touch sensitive, nice. It is in the living/dining rooms open area, my kitchen is near but not too close. This morning I cooked bacon, now mind you I don’t mind smelling bacon, however this little Air Purifier took it upon itself to remove it immediately! It is not even that near my kitchen! WOW! I am impressed so I order another one for my bedroom. I played with the light too making sure everything woks, nice little touch.Noise… I have excellent hearing, the lowest level is so quiet it startled me, the other levels are soft white noise, not loud & not obtrusive either.I really like this Air Purifier and I do recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works well, looks sleek, and it’s so quiet. I can’t hear it at all in my bedroom which is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I happen to get it under $30 plus extra discount, not so long ago. Really great deal from its competitors that doesn't release ozone. So far, it's really doing its job. I placed it in between the living room and the kitchen, somewhere in the center. So that we can try if it's really going to purify the air cause normally if we cook fish or any other food with strong scent, the smell of it spreads everywhere inside the house. As a throwback when we don't have a purifier, strong scent from cooking takes several hours before it subsides, but when we tried using air purifier, it didn't take that long and the smell of food eventually became barely noticeable. I can tell that it's really doing its job in just a short period of time because on the filter it has now faint particles attached on it. We haven't used it for a month yet, that's why it's too faint.Also, they have a very informative and accommodating customer service when I checked on them if the item is ozone-free and they assured me that it is indeed ozone-free. That's exactly what I'm looking for and the great deal was just an addition on me liking this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It definitely works, but it doesn’t clean the air as much as I would like. I have cleaned the filter so it’s for sure filtering some of the dust, but the air is just not as clean as I need it to be as someone with asthma. I’m going to get a different filter besides the one it comes with and see if that helps. The lowest setting is practically silent, but the higher two settings are very loud. It has lights which are fun, and you can turn them off without powering down the device.

I was so pleased with this product.The seller has went above and beyond to ensure a quality product for an affordable price . That is easy to navigate. Certainly as advertised and still exceeded my expectations. Would make a great gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for a long time now and it's still working well. Very pleased with the unit and its proven itself to be good value. It's been good to use, a range of speed settings available but in truth I think 99% of the time I use it on sleep mode.I get a stuffy nose in the summer months, overnight while I'm asleep. This helped filter the air in my bedroom so the sleep mode came in very handy. It didn't stop it happening completely and also meant I needed to keep the windows closed, but keeping curtains closed during the day to helped cool the room before sleeping.
Den Geräuschpegel kann man regulieren - entweder geringere Leistung einstellen, oder Gerät weiter wegstellen. Schönes Farbspiel, angenehme Luft!
Just bought it and placed in my son's bedroom. I will see how it is in a few months time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Breathe easy ( in old homes =MUST) quiet, removes smells / lint . good value, giftable 👍
reviews.reviewText: Dimensions 20D x 19W x 32H Cm, 2.86 lbs. Noise Level 20 dB 💪 small TIP : bef. replacing- try to vacuum filter with handheld, remove plastic bag bef. adding/changing filter. small spaces. low-dust area ( not for garage with wood construction)🧐( not 880 sq ft) but for 400-500, some light stays ON at night. Smoke/ cooking removal average.🤪Low electricity use, little unit works wonders for bedroom, not noticeable for noise or visuals, blends into white walls. Fresens, best not removes best. I ❤ to share my trials. Hope this helps ✌
